name: Computational Thinker
description:
Navigate your creature toward the large glowing crystals and collect their energi. Give instructions and watch it perform them to perfection, but remember you have a finite amount of instructions and it will follow your orders precisely.  

This is a work in progress build of my bachelor thesis. Everything is subject to change. There may be bugs, unpolished aspects, and missing features(e.g., sound and music). 

In case of level breaking bugs, please report the bug at the at the following link: https://forms.gle/7DdvjPsBQu65F5g18

The purpose of this project is to create a game, which teaches the fundamentals of computational thinking, as intuitively as possible.

Windows version is recommended, as the other versions have not been tested as much.
